Articles.Content:
Hello I want you for B.I.S.A.!! Just kidding, not a recruiting forum. I want you to give me planes, tanks, and Artillery ( Howitzer or Self Propelled ) and I will build it. 

Get Creative! It doesn't even have to be real! A good Fan art pic would get me started! Happy thinking and I will Happy build! ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

Certainly you can attempt a Wright Flyer? ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

![224-Wright-Flyer-III_01.jpg](https://www.asme.org/wwwasmeorg/media/ASMEMedia/About%20ASME/WhoWeAre/History/Landmarks/224-Wright-Flyer-III_01.jpg)
Ill see what I can do Maximus! Oh and btw I can only work on theses things on Thursdays and every other weekend so yeah but it'll keep me busy guys!
[imgur.com/saZ9JJU](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/imgur.com/saZ9JJU) heres the plane! lol sorry it took a long time, the router kept dying and KSP crashed before I saved it, sorry XP
